sentences.sContent: Violent crime is now endemic in parts of Chicago.
sentences.sCn: 芝加哥一些地区暴力犯罪成患。

synos.tran: [医][内科]地方性的；[生物]风土的

remMethod.val: en (在…中) + dem (人们) + ic (…的) → 在人们之中流传的 → 风土的

words.tran: 特有现象；地方特殊性；地方性生长；特有分布

trans.tranOther: an endemic disease or problem is always present in a particular place, or among a particular group of people
